Articles.Content:
Just starting KSP.

This is the best game I have played in my long years of gaming.

Thank you Squad.

KSP has been the most addicting game I've ever played.

Well, TES V: Skyrim is tied. But still.

welcome to the forums!

KSP is a strange one. I haven't played it all that much lately, but unlike other games... it's still there. Lurking. Staring at me. Waiting for me to break and play it... it's evil.

Quick, run! Run while you ca- *gets grabbed from behind and dragged out the door*

This message was brought to you to invite you to the Kerbal Space Program Forum. We hope you will enjoy your stay. Please note that attempting to scare others away from the game will be met with immediate termination.
